Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.common.repository

Class AbstractBrutRepository

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.common.repository.BrxmTestingRepository
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.common.repository.AbstractBrutRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Repository
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfigServiceRepository, SkeletonRepository
public abstract class AbstractBrutRepository extends BrxmTestingRepository
Abstract base class for BRUT repository implementations. Provides common CND registration, namespace handling, and hippo path calculation methods.
